MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Java.Lang.Object Get() cil managed

Docs.summary: Waits if necessary for the computation to complete, and then retrieves its result.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: If the computation threw an exception.
If the current thread was interrupted while waiting.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void PublishProgress(class Java.Lang.Object[] values) cil managed

Docs.param: The progress values to update the UI with.
Docs.summary: This method can be invoked from #doInBackground to publish updates on the UI thread while the background computation is still running.

Docs.summary: An Executor that can be used to execute tasks in parallel.
